aggregate(tuple[]).code: function aggregate(Multicall.Call[] calls) external nonpayable returns (uint256 blockNumber, bytes[] returnData)

getBlockHash(uint256).code: function getBlockHash(uint256 blockNumber) external view returns (bytes32 blockHash)

getCurrentBlockCoinbase().code: function getCurrentBlockCoinbase() external view returns (address coinbase)

getCurrentBlockDifficulty().code: function getCurrentBlockDifficulty() external view returns (uint256 difficulty)

getCurrentBlockGasLimit().code: function getCurrentBlockGasLimit() external view returns (uint256 gaslimit)

getCurrentBlockTimestamp().code: function getCurrentBlockTimestamp() external view returns (uint256 timestamp)

getEthBalance(address).code: function getEthBalance(address addr) external view returns (uint256 balance)

getLastBlockHash().code: function getLastBlockHash() external view returns (bytes32 blockHash)

title: Multicall - Aggregate results from multiple read-only function calls
